expo.name: Jharkhand Civic Portal
expo.description: Official Government of Jharkhand Civic Issue Reporting System

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of civic issues for reporting to the government.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select photos for civic issue reporting.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to tag civic issues with precise location data.
